forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the day reveals itself with a mostly sunny demeanor, a gentle warmth gracing the city with a high nearing 61 degrees. A soft wind from the west-southwest caresses the streets, invigorating the air with a refreshing clarity that makes everything feel a touch more vibrant. While the horizon is painted in hues of blue and gold, hints of a lingering marine layer whisper of a day that may pivot towards coolness as night approaches. 

Tonight, the clouds will weave a delicate tapestry over the city, darkening into a gentle partly cloudy expanse and inviting a night to settle in with temperatures dipping modestly to around 50 degrees. As the evening creeps closer, those stepping out might find it wise to don a light jacket or sweater — perfect for strolling along the Embarcadero or enjoying a quiet dinner at one of the charming bistros that line the streets. The weather embraces a feeling of comfort and companionship, urging you towards understated evening adventures that resonate with both joy and tranquility.
